channel.title: new year on Cisco Skills
channel.description: Recent content in new year on Cisco Skills

item.title: Goals
item.description: Every year I think about goals, either how to conquer them, reflect on them, and recently change them. We all have been there, we have a plan in our head that we follow for a handful of years or even decades... something happens... all of sudden things change. It's this change that I believe is so important to life, we can't and shouldn't be static, we have to change in order to grow ourselves.
